column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Because it was Valentine's Day
column2: I had a rose in a paper bag with me.  The staff members said that I couldn't bring it in nor would they keep it under the front desk.  It wouldn't hurt to keep it under the desk for a while
column3: right?  Another downside is that the artworks haven't been changed for as far as I remember.  It is cool that it's got Millet
column7: but it doesn't have some more prestigious artworks.  It would be nice if they could bring some more Picasso
